lead_paragraph: Punishments will be considered for the two agents who drove into an area near the White House where an investigation was underway.

headline.print_headline: Report Sees Alcohol Involved in Secret Service Car Episode
headline.main: Report Sees Alcohol Involved in Secret Service Car Episode

snippet: Punishments will be considered for the two agents who drove into an area near the White House where an investigation was underway.
abstract: Homeland Security Inspector General John Roth says Secret Service agents Mark Connolly and George Ogilvie were likely intoxicated when they drove into area near White House where agents were inspecting suspicious package in March; agents have been criticized for lack of judgement.
